author: Universal Pictures
description:
From the desert sands of Hamunaptra to the icy tombs of China, every major mummy attack from The Mummy (1999), The Mummy Returns, and Tomb of the Dragon Emperor is here: fast, relentless, and packed with undead fury. Whether it's Imhotep (Arnold Vosloo) rising again or the Dragon Emperor (Jet Li) unleashing chaos, these scenes never slow down.

Buy/Rent The Mummy
